structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Appeal of administrative action to court.
law.text: Any person aggrieved by any administrative action pursuant to this chapter or regulations promulgated pursuant thereto, may appeal such action to a court of competent jurisdiction.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 65, effective July 15, 1982.
